description: Trystan Bull is inviting you to partake in his first wine tasting. A novice when it comes to the vine & grape, he nonetheless knows what he wants. And truth be told, what Trystan wants can't really be found at the bottom of a bottle. Enter Nick Reeves, Trystan's friend and guest for the tasting. After several sips, both Nick & Trystan are feeling a little hot and tipsy. Which is just what Trystan had in mind. Soon enough, Nick will be doing some tasting of a whole other variety.Enjoy!
title: Wine & Grind
